categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Lonely Five was the personal starfighter of the Jedi Knight and archaeologist Rachi Sitra. It was a blue and white Eta-2 Actis-class interceptor named after the Lonely Five Range of mountains on her home planet of Ryloth.
Sitra piloted this ship in many air and space battles alongside the bravest star pilots in the Rebel Alliance, who fought alongside her in their X-wing and Y-wing starfighters.
